---
title: "Libra2 C++ / Unreal SDK"
---

There is a C++ / Unreal SDK for Libra2, built by Var Meta [here](https://github.com/VAR-META-Tech/Libra2-Cpp-SDK/)

## Installing the SDK

There are installation instructions, as well as usage instructions [here](https://github.com/VAR-META-Tech/Libra2-Cpp-SDK/?tab=readme-ov-file#installation-guide)
